backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing chatroom functionality with message storage, user profiles, reactions, image storage via blob-storage, access control, and HTTP outcalls. Includes CRUD operations for chatrooms, messages, reactions, view tracking, and admin functions with password protection.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the restoration of image and GIF display functionality in MessageBubble.tsx using the working approach from draft version 261.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Comprehensive summaries of all frontend components including routing, query hooks, UI components for chat, messages, avatars, and pages with details on image/GIF handling, reply functionality, and responsive design.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with cache-busting meta tags, viewport configuration for mobile support, and versioned script tag (v=203) to force production refresh.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root application component configuring TanStack Router with lobby, chatroom, and admin routes, conditional header/footer rendering, theme provider, and 404 handling.
frontend/src/components/AvatarPickerDial: Dialog component for avatar selection supporting file upload, Giphy GIF search with debounced queries, trending GIFs, and avatar removal with request ID tracking to prevent race conditions.
frontend/src/components/ChatArea.tsx: Main chat interface with collapsible header, pinned video area, scrollable message list filtering out Creator messages without media (checking mediaUrl, imageId, giphyUrl), auto-scroll on new messages, reply preview, and message input integration.
frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx: Displays a chatroom card with thumbnail previews for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter media, showing live status, participant count, message count, and timestamp. Fetches Twitch thumbnails and Twitter oEmbed previews on mount.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatroomDi: Dialog component for creating new chatrooms with topic, description, category, and media options (image upload, YouTube/Twitch video URLs, or Twitter posts). Validates video URLs, handles image uploads with progress tracking, and renders Twitter embed previews.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer component displaying copyright notice and attribution link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: App header with logo, username editing functionality, avatar picker button, and back-to-lobby navigation when in a chatroom. Displays character count progress bar during username editing.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Intentional no-op placeholder component that renders nothing, as the app is designed to work anonymously without authentication.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders individual chat messages with support for text, images, voice messages, YouTube/Twitch/Twitter embeds, reactions, pinning, and reply functionality. Handles reaction management and displays referenced messages when replying.
frontend/src/components/MessageInput.tsx: Chat input component supporting text messages, image uploads with compression, voice recording, GIF selection via Giphy API, and link preview detection. Includes character limit enforcement and upload progress tracking.
frontend/src/components/MessageInputLink: Displays preview cards for YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter links in message input, fetching Twitter oEmbed data and showing thumbnails/metadata for each platform.
frontend/src/components/PinnedVideo.tsx: Renders a pinned video player with YouTube or Twitch embeds and provides an unpin button to remove the pinned video from a chatroom.
frontend/src/components/VoiceMessagePlay: Audio player component with waveform visualization, play/pause controls, and time slider for voice messages, ensuring only one audio plays at a time.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and manages the backend actor instance based on Internet Identity authentication state, invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useDebouncedValue.ts: Custom hook that debounces a value by delaying updates until a specified delay period has passed without changes.
Hook that extracts and identifies the first YouTube, Twitch, or Twitter URL from text input using regex pattern matching.
frontend/src/hooks/useForceFreshChatroom: Hook that purges stale chatroom cache entries and forces a fresh refetch when the actor becomes ready, preventing persisted empty arrays from blocking lobby display.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and delegation validation using AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for chatroom operations (fetching, creating, joining, leaving, sending messages, reactions, replies) and includes helpers for user ID/username management, image upload with compression, and localStorage-based blob storage.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark themes, mobile-specific input styles to prevent zoom on iOS, and custom styling for voice message range inputs.
frontend/src/lib/config.ts: Exports frontend configuration constants for Giphy API integration (API key and result limit).
frontend/src/lib/formatters.ts: Provides a utility function to format numbers with compact notation (k, M, B) for display purposes.
frontend/src/lib/giphy.ts: Implements Giphy API integration with functions to search GIFs and fetch trending GIFs, returning structured results with preview and original URLs.
frontend/src/lib/html2canvasLoader.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for dynamic html2canvas library loading.
frontend/src/lib/imageCompression.ts: Client-side image compression utility that resizes and recompresses images using canvas while preserving orientation, with configurable quality and dimensions, and progress callback support.
frontend/src/lib/twitterEmbedRenderer.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter embed rendering functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreview.ts: Fetches Twitter oEmbed JSON data and extracts safe preview fields (author, text, image) with caching and request deduplication to avoid CORS issues.
frontend/src/lib/twitterOEmbedPreviewCac: Manages localStorage caching for Twitter oEmbed preview data with validation, versioning, and 7-day expiration to reduce API calls.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnail.ts: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail generation functionality.
frontend/src/lib/twitterThumbnailCache.t: Empty file, likely a placeholder for Twitter thumbnail caching functionality.
frontend/src/lib/urlExtractor.ts: Extracts the first supported URL (YouTube, Twitch, or Twitter) from text strings and returns the URL with its type for embed handling.
frontend/src/lib/videoUtils.ts: Utility functions for extracting video IDs and generating thumbnail URLs from YouTube, Twitch, and Twitter/X URLs, including embed URL generation with proper parent parameters.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDeleteChatroomsP: Admin page with password authentication for viewing and deleting chatrooms, featuring category filtering and a table view of all chatrooms.
frontend/src/pages/ChatroomPage.tsx: Individual chatroom page that loads chatroom data, increments view count on mount, and renders the ChatArea component with loading and error states.
frontend/src/pages/LobbyPage.tsx: Main lobby page displaying all chatrooms with client-side search and category filtering, create chatroom dialog, and navigation to individual chatrooms.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom OKLCH color system, extended theme values for UI components, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking document indicating a fix request to restore image and GIF display functionality in MessageBubble.tsx using blob.getDirectURL() and giphyUrl fields.
